description:
Wireless radiation has been shown time and time again to have detrimental health effects to all living organisms, and especially to children. 5G would create inescapable ""soup"" of radiation through out the world. Not only does 5G pose major health risks to both humans and the environment as a whole, but it also plays a key role in the Globalist Cult's Agenda. Research UN Agenda 21/Agenda 2030. They wish to drive the vast majority of humanity into large ""Smart"" City's powered by 5G, run by AI, and filled with millions of facial recognition cameras. Imagine George Orwell's 1984 and modern day China put together, except worse. They want people addicted to technology and eventually they want to connect humans to machines. We must avoid this at all costs if we wish to live in a free society. Connecting humans to AI will be sold under the guise of making us ""superhuman"" when in reality it would make us subhuman/inhuman. The only way to reach anything that one would consider to be superhuman is by reconnecting with nature fully. Nature heals and powers us. 
#5G #emf #emfprotection #radiationtherapy #truther #governmentcorruption #globalistscult #protectyourself #glyphosate #monsanto #radiation #chemtrail #chemtrails #fluoridefree #gmo #eathealthyfood #eatorganic #meditatedaily #healyourbody #healyourgut #healyourlife #begratefuleveryday #healthymindhealthybody #spirituality #consciousnessshift #breathedeep #reconnectwithnature
